name: Robber escape
description:
What a robber have to do to escape from lots of armed polices without being shot? Shoot and run as fast as he can! Kill or being killed.

Because the robber has to go for a long path, the farther he goes, the more polices he faces. How far The robber can go is base on you. Be smart and fast!!
Let's play Robber Escape, be a escaping robber and see how many polices you can shoot down.
--------------------------------------------
How to play Robber Escape?
- Tap the screen to start, hold it until you find out the right angle then release to shoot them down!
- Have fun and don't forget to leave us a rate if you like it.
--------------------------------------------
Features in Robber Escape:
- Graphic: 2D, Simple, spectacular
- Easy to play
- Close to player: Solitaire game
- Unlimited level
--------------------------------------------
We hope all players will enjoy Robber escape
